known_issues: Current like behavior may allow the same student to like the same post multiple times.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend post-like UI to gracefully handle a duplicate-like attempt by showing an English user-facing message instead of failing silently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Prevent a student from liking the same post multiple times (enforce one-like-per-student-per-post).
Enforce a one-like-per-student-per-post rule in the backend so the same authenticated caller cannot successfully like the same post more than once.
If existing persisted post data must be upgraded, add/extend conditional migration logic so existing posts initialize the new per-post liked-by tracking without breaking getPosts or likePost.

projectName: Prevent the same student from liking the same post multiple times
